info.name: MTN MoMo Open API (v0.9.6)
info.description:
Power your apps with our MTN MoMo Open API

The Open API is a JSON REST API that is used by Partner systems to access services in the Wallet platform. 
The Open API exposes services that are used by e.g. online merchants for managing payments and other financial services.

Developers are issued a Primary Key and Secondary Key for every product. Both primary and secondary Subscription key provides access to the API. Without one of them a developer cannot access any of the APIs. Subscriptions are stored under the user profile and never expire.

Values for the target environment (X-Target-Environment)

MTN Uganda= mtnuganda 
MTN Ghana= mtnghana 
MTN Ivory Coast= mtnivorycoast 
MTN Zambia= mtnzambia 
MTN Cameroon= mtncameroon 
MTN Benin= mtnbenin 
MTN Congo= mtncongo 
MTN Swaziland= mtnswaziland 

Available currencies:
MTN Uganda= UGX 
MTN Ghana= GHS 
MTN Ivory Coast= XOF 
MTN Zambia= ZMW
MTN Cameroon= XAF 
MTN Benin= CFA 
MTN Congo= CDF 
MTN Swaziland= SZL

Some demographical data on countries where MTP MoMoPay is actively used:

MTN Ghana= 23.9 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 31.77 million (2018/2019/2020)
MTN Uganda= 12.6 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 42.72 million (2018/2019)
MTN Ivory Coast= 12.0 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 26.37 million (2018/2019/2020)
MTN Zambia= 6 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 17.35 million (2018/2019/2020) 
MTN Cameroon= 8 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 26.54 million (2018/2019/2020)  
MTN Benin= 6 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 11.5 million (2018/2019/2020)  
MTN Congo= 2.6 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 84 million (2018/2019/2020)   
MTN Swaziland= >1 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 1.2 million (2018/2019/2020)  
MTN Nigeria= 64.3 million subscribers with a total pupulation of 207.22 million (2018/2019/2020)

Known Partner Portals:
MTN Swaziland/Eswatini - https://partner.mtn.co.sz/partner/
MTN Uganda - https://mobilemoneyreadonly.mtn.co.ug/partner/
MTN Ghana - https://partner.mobilemoney.mtn.com.gh/partner/
MTN Cameroon - https://momo.mtncameroon.net/partner/

How to signup for Mobile Money
MTN Uganda - https://www.mtn.co.ug/mtn-momo/register/

Known production Hosts:

proxy.momoapi.mtn.com
ericssonbasicapi1.azure-api.net
ericssonbasicapi2.azure-api.net

API Callbacks
Some MoMoPay API requests allow to set the callback URL, for example Collection/requesttopay, allows to send a URL in the header which will be called once the status of the payment changes. At the moment of writing there is no documention on what is sent back, however thanks to the community support we have got an sample data, you can see it below:

{
    "financialTransactionId": "7950782885",
    "externalId": "2019092712011693486",
    "amount": "1000",
    "currency": "<ISO4217 Currency code>",
    "payer": {
        "partyTypeId": "MSISDN",
        "partyId: "2335XXXXXXXXXX"
    }
    "payeeNote": "my note",
    "status": "SUCCESSFUL"
}

Some known field values:
partyTypeId: MSISDN | EMAIL | PARTY_CODE
status: SUCCESSFUL | PENDING | FAILED
reason: INTERNAL_PROCESSING_ERROR (often happens when the balance of the MoMo wallet is lower than the amount requested)

Some Live numbers for testing:

256772123456 - Uganda
26878721737 - Swaziland/Eswatini
26876060239 - Swaziland/Eswatini
26876060228 - Swaziland/Eswatini
237679465319 - Cameroon
233246824458 - Ghana

Some known API errors:

{"statusCode": 403, "message": "Out of call volume quota. Quota will be replenished in 13:52:42." }

item.name: Sandbox User Provisioning

request.description:
This is the first API call you must do in the Sandbox.

It is used to create an API user in the sandbox target environment.

This request will require a valid Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key Found in your Profile on https://momodeveloper.mtn.com

It also requites a valid X-Reference-Id aka. recource ID for the API user to be created. UUID version 4.

This is the first API call you must do in the Sandbox.

It is used to create an API user in the sandbox target environment.

This request will require a valid Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key Found in your Profile on https://momodeveloper.mtn.com

It also requites a valid X-Reference-Id aka. recource ID for the API user to be created. UUID version 4.
Used to get API user information.
Used to get API user information.
Used to create an API key for an API user in the sandbox target environment.
Used to create an API key for an API user in the sandbox target environment.

item.description:
Sandbox Provisioning API used to test your product in the Sandbox. Know limitation:

1. Callbacks are not working in the Sandbox
2. Sandbox cannot send real request for money (USSD Push)

request.description: This API call is used to create an access token which can then be used to authorize and authenticate towards the other end-points of the API.

This operation is used to request a payment from a consumer (Payer). The payer will be asked to authorize the payment. The transaction will be executed once the payer has authorized the payment. The requesttopay will be in status PENDING until the transaction is authorized or declined by the payer or it is timed out by the system. Status of the transaction can be validated by using the GET /requesttopay/<resourceId>

Test numbers are below. The number is set in the Environment as "customerPhoneNumber". Default number is 46733123454

46733123450	failed
46733123451	rejected
46733123452	timeout
46733123453	ongoing (will answer pending first and if requested again after 30 seconds it will respond success)
46733123454	pending
This operation is used to get the status of a request to pay. X-Reference-Id that was passed in the post is used as reference to the request.
Get the balance of the account.

Operation is used to check if an account holder is registered and active in the system.

Specifies the type of the party ID. Allowed values [msisdn, email, party_code].
accountHolderId should explicitly be in small letters.

Operation is used to check if an account holder is registered and active in the system.

Specifies the type of the party ID. Allowed values [msisdn, email, party_code].
accountHolderId should explicitly be in small letters.

exec: throw new Error("Check your environment, it looks like Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key-Collection is not set!");
throw new Error("Please set Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key-Collection/COLLECTION_PRIMARY_KEY_DEV in the environment!!");
throw new Error("Check your environment, it looks like X-Target-Environment is not set!");
throw new Error("We failed, please contact support at info@clickon.ch");
//save the value and make another request
throw new Error("We failed, please contact support at info@clickon.ch");
//save the value and make another request
throw new Error("We failed, please contact support at info@clickon.ch");
throw new Error("Failed to get Sandbox user api key");
throw new Error("Failed to get Sandbox user");

request.description: This API call is used to create an access token which can then be used to authorize and authenticate towards the other end-points of the API.

Transfer operation is used to transfer an amount from the owner’s account to a payee account.
Status of the transaction can be validated by using the GET /transfer/{referenceId}
This operation is used to get the status of a request to pay. X-Reference-Id that was passed in the post is used as reference to the request.
Get the balance of the account.

Operation is used to check if an account holder is registered and active in the system.

Specifies the type of the party ID. Allowed values [msisdn, email, party_code].
accountHolderId should explicitly be in small letters.

exec: throw new Error("Check your environment, it looks like Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key-Disbursements is not set!");

request.description: This API call is used to create an access token which can then be used to authorize and authenticate towards the other end-points of the API.

Transfer operation is used to transfer an amount from the owner’s account to a payee account.
Status of the transaction can be validated by using the GET /transfer/{referenceId}
This operation is used to get the status of a request to pay. X-Reference-Id that was passed in the post is used as reference to the request.
Get the balance of the account.

Operation is used to check if an account holder is registered and active in the system.

Specifies the type of the party ID. Allowed values [msisdn, email, party_code].
accountHolderId should explicitly be in small letters.

Operation is used to check if an account holder is registered and active in the system.

Specifies the type of the party ID. Allowed values [msisdn, email, party_code].
accountHolderId should explicitly be in small letters.
